biotools.summary: TFcancer is a manually curated database of transcription factors associated with human cancer. TFcancer features in comprehensive annotations of TFs in human cancers. TFcancer mainly focused on the influence of transcription factors on four dimensions in cancer: dysexpression, molecular alteration, regulatory relationships between TFs and other genes, last but not least, cancer process and signaling pathways. Users can retrieve results by searching specific TF names or cancer types.
